price: So keep exhorting [O Prophet], for you are not, by the grace of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
